interestingcomments.content:
Nikon D4S can you map it as a network drive when connected via ethernet? /!/ Just wondering is it possible to map the camera as a network location so I can access the files and download them to the computer all at once? I've setup http and PC transfer methods..however on http you can only download one file at a time.. and on PC you have to go to each file and send to the computer... Is there a way to just select and download all the photos I want via ethernet? Help!

Thank you
